word:
Wherever we are, we are under obligation, as disciples of our Lord and Master, to anchor our faith in the promises of God. Individually we are to believe. We are not to cast about for a possible doubt, or imagine that sometime we may have to stand beneath the shadow of a cloud that seems to be gathering. 


                              -613- 

We are chosen of God to be His children. We have been bought with an infinite price, and we have no occasion for placing the suggestion of the enemy before the assurances of the Lord Jesus Christ.
